Job Title: Product Owner

Location: Alpharetta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Whether you started from the product side and developed technical skills or started as a technical resource, you have a knack for the product side of the business. You possess the necessary technical product knowledge to drive strategic conversations about the product and enhance value to Equifax and its customers.

Equifax is seeking a Product Owner who is a master at bridging the desires of the customer and the capabilities of the technology, removing barriers to software development. You will be responsible for grooming the product backlog and have insight into technical requirements of individual stories thus creating a more efficient user experience.

What You Will Do

 You will serve as the conduit between user needs, technical capabilities, and engineering requirements, developing these into roadmaps and requirements for the Agile backlog of a development team.  You will lead the backlog refinement of features and user stories and ensure delivery teams are prepared to meet sprint deadline. You will work with others on a day-to-day basis to help make decisions on what is in scope and provide input into functional decisions.  You will have daily interaction with the teams building the products. You will focus on product level impediments and process changes to enable faster and higher quality software.  You make tough decisions on trade-offs between features, quality and dates in order to provide the best solution for our clients  You ensure Product leadership is aware of key issues and changes, and provide them with the right information and recommendations to resolve issues. You work with Product Managers to ensure the features in a release represent what is needed and that return on investment is in line with their expectations  You have in-depth knowledge of goals and desired objectives of the initiatives and features. You will drive value as a function of cost, time, functionality and quality. You will work with Architect(s) and Tech Lead(s) to identify non-functional requirements like infrastructure needs  You will work with Quality Assurance team member(s) to identify test cases for automated testing. You will coordinate with business customers to conduct product integration testing Key Responsibilities Preparation and Participation in PI Planning Program Backlog 

What Experience You Need

 BS or MS degree in Computer Science or Business or equivalent job experience required  3 years’ in experience managing product backlogs and requirements for Agile delivery teams in a Product Owner capacity  3 years’ experience delivering products using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) 

What Could Set You Apart

 You are skilled at removing roadblocks  You have experience delivering products using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)  You possess a deep understanding of web service technologies, user interface/interaction, and knowledge of Systems Development and Project Management lifecycles  You have experience with Product & Technology Roadmap development through influence of key business and technology partners to identify business priorities  You have excellent leadership and motivational skills  You possess a willingness to empower as well as encourage commitment and positive attitude in the team  You have an inquisitive and innovative mindset with a shown ability to recognize opportunities to create distinctive value  You can successfully evaluate workload to drive efficiency  You have the ability build strong relationships with partners across the business; ensure that you understand their role, the needs of their area, and their requirements throughout the project  You are a self-starter who is organized, detail oriented, takes initiative with minimal direction, and understands concepts quickly  You understand the value of product ownership and can effectively communicate the value proposition  You have experience working with multiple partners in a global setting with varying level of needs  You bring a consultative, creative and process driven approach to your work  You have an aptitude for handling multiple concurrent demands and prioritizing responsibilities in a dynamic, high energy environment  Your problem-solving skills enable you to effectively and creatively find solutions for hard problems while maintaining a high level of professionalism and integrity  Engage and collaborate with all stakeholders, make people feel heard and understood, are able to say no and stand up for tough calls needed to better serve the business and our clients

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
